items.content_html: A collection of sleek and responsive UI components built with Tailwind CSS. This library offers modern, lightweight, and customizable components that you can easily integrate into your projects. Designed for various frameworks or plain HTML, it provides a consistent and stylish look with minimal setup. Simply copy the code snippets and use them

items.content_html: Angular Drag Drop Layout is a lightweight, dependency-free Angular library for creating highly customizable, responsive grid layouts with drag-and-drop functionality. Built with Angular 18 and utilizing Angular Signals, this library provides a seamless and optimized experience for building dynamic and interactive layouts.
items.title: skutam/angular-drag-drop-layout: Angular Drag Drop Layout is a lightweight, dependency-free Angular library for creating highly customizable, responsive grid layouts with drag-and-drop functionality.
